text: The Xiaomi Mi Note 10 (Mi CC9 Pro in China) is a mid-range Android smartphone developed by the company Xiaomi. It is the first smartphone with a 108 MP camera. ==Camera== Pentacamera setup consists of 5 modules, they are on the upper left side of the phone. The main wide-angle lens is a Samsung S5KHMX (1/1.33 inch) sensor with a resolution of 108 MP and a light-power lens with 8 lenses (also for the first time in smartphones, but only in premium edition) with an F/1.69 aperture. It has optical stabilization. The second camera is a 12-megapixel telephoto lens with an F/2.0 aperture. The third is a 20-megapixel ultrawide-angle lens with a 117° viewing angle and an F/2.2 aperture. The fourth is a 8-megapixel telephoto lens with an F/2.0 aperture. It has a 5-fold optical zoom (hybrid 50x) and optical stabilization. The fifth is 2 MP macro lens with a minimum focus distance of 1.5 cm. Two dual LED flash units are on the right of the camera unit. Two are ordinary and two soft warm light. This allows you to take much better photos at night. The front camera has 32 MP. In addition, the smartphone uses AI widely for photographing, as well as RAW format. ===Videos=== The smartphone can shoot video 4K@30fps and ultra-slow 720p video at 960 hp or 1080p at 240 hp. ===Camera ratings=== DxOMark rated the smartphone cameras at huawei mate 30 Pro level, which costs twice as much. Photos from Xiaomi Mi Note 10 received 130 points (Huawei — 132), and video from Xiaomi scored 102 points (Huawei only 100). Xiaomi Mi Note 10 thus finished second after the Huawei Mate 30 Pro, pushing the samsung Galaxy Note 10+ 5G into third place. ==Screen== The phone has a 6.47 inch OLED screen and Full HD+ resolution curved on the side edges. The manufacturer calls it "hyperbolic" for advertising purposes. The screen provides coverage of the DCI-P3 color space and is characterized by a contrast of 400 000:1. The fingerprint scanner is built under the screen. ==Battery and charger== The model has a battery capacity of 5260 mAh (most of these models from other manufacturers have batteries capacity of 3000-3500 mAh). Xiaomi Mi Note 10 has a fast charger with a capacity of 30 W. It can be charged up to 58% in half an hour, and up to 100% in 65 minutes. ==Availability== In China, the phone was presented on November 5, 2019, on November 6, a presentation was held in Spain, 14 — in Poland. In Ukraine, sales started on November 21, 2019. ==Related pages== *Xiaomi Mi Note 3 *Realme X2 Pro Category:Xiaomi mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: Xiaomi Mi Note 10
